title: IMMERSE - Ambient Music
description: 11 Songs and 4 Fanfares for your game!
longDescription:
Hi Dev!


This pack was created thinking about the total immersion of the player in the game, it contains calm and beautiful music, based on old SNES, GBA and PS1 games. This package is intended to make the player get lost in the gameplay.


It will be very useful for moments under water, caves, calm and open fields, villages, moments of peace and calm.


These songs also make the player reflect, and it is also interesting to use them at some plot point in the story, when a character realizes something, or in a moment of great reflection.


The Pack also has 4 fanfares, 2 for victory and 2 for defeat, they can be used for good and bad moments in the game, such as: Opening a chest, finding an item, or losing a battle, they are for specific moments.


By investing in this package you get all of this described and still encourages me to continue bringing content to the community at a super cool price!


Check the preview


Resume


11 - Songs

2 - Victory Fanfares

2 - Defeat Fanfares


License:

non-exclusive license – you’re free to use these packs in your commercial games. No license to claim as your own work.
